questions.question: A poset or partially ordered set A is a pair, ( B,≤ ) of a set B whose elements are called the vertices of A and obeys following rules
___ elements of A are those where a ≤ c in A does not contain elements in c

explanations.a: Maximal elemets of A are those where a ≤ c in A does not contain elements in c
explanations.b: Maximal elemets of A are those where a ≤ c in A does not contain elements in c
explanations.c: Maximal elemets of A are those where a ≤ c in A does not contain elements in c
explanations.d: Maximal elemets of A are those where a ≤ c in A does not contain elements in c
